title: Colchester City Council investigating Capita over 'serious data breach'
description: Colchester City Council "extremely disappointed" Capita failed to fully secure historic benefits data.

title: Face recognition used at Cardiff Beyoncé concert criticised
description: The police are using the technology on the city's streets, a move that has divided opinion.

title: Elon Musk: I will say what I want even if it costs me
description: Twitter's owner has been criticised for spreading disinformation and conspiracy theories online.

title: Ex-Apple engineer accused of stealing self-driving car secrets
description: The 35-year-old suspect allegedly downloaded large amounts of data before fleeing to China.
